channel.title: How can i make a special hit more then 2 times?

item.title: How can i make a special hit more then 2 times?
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

[quote=“latin king, post:2, topic:263283”]public void ITEM NAME HERE() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8790) {
setAnimation(2068);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(30);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(30);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8790) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(600);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(2068);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }[/quote]

That will never owrk i use delta

item.title: How can i make a special hit more then 2 times?

item.description:
@latin_king wrote:

public void ITEM NAME HERE() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8790) {
setAnimation(2068);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(30);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(30);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8790) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(600);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(2068);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }

Speical i use is:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8790 && specialAmount > 99){ specialAtk(true, 25, 274, 0x426); setAnimation(2876); getHit(28); usingSpecial = true; }
